mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode, I.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, I.ITEM_PRICE AS itemPrice, C.CART_QUANTITY AS cartQuantity FROM CARTS C JOIN ITEMS I ON C.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTS (ITEM_CODE, USER_CODE, USER_ID, CART_QUANTITY) VALUES (#{itemCode}, #{userCode}, #{userId}, ${cartQuantity})
